body:
(1) blis - changed configure function with configure_args name which
    will return args to configure function

(2) amdblis - reused configure_args from blis package using super
    function and updated the amdblis specific flags for 3.0 version

(3) amdlibflame - Enabling '--enable-f2c-dotc' flags from version 3.0
    onwards

(4) amdlibm - Added reference to 3.0 release branch

(5) amdscalapack - Added reference to 3.0 release

(6) aocl-sparse - Added suport for ilp64 variant from version 3.0
   Incorporated review comments from previous below pull request
   https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/22276
title: Spack recipes for AOCL 3.0
